title: Cam Martinez - Co-Founder Of LVRG
itunes:title: Cam Martinez - Co-Founder Of LVRG
description:
A solid strategy to generate business is creating win/win/wins. A win for the customer, win for the company, and a win for the JV partner is just one example we talked about.
 
An even better strategy is to attach a mission-based cause behind the business to create even bigger wins.
 
Cam Martinez is the Co-Founder of LRVG and host of The 6 Figure Roadmap Podcast.
 
In this interview, we layout how you can supercharge your business by giving it the rocket fuel it needs.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/cam-martinez/
